ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:19:43 [Issue ID 4000-99178] urn:comicvine:4000-99178 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 04:36:53. [Issue ID 219457]
ComicInfo.Summary: Mafia boss Twistelli experiences several hits. The first bomb, strapped to a small boy, killed several of Twistelli's friends at a wedding; an anti-aircraft gun destroyed the money laundering warehouse, the cell phone cloning operation and a restaurant. Twistelli calls the mob to find out who is after him and why no one will get involved. Jason Wynn gives Twistelli the news: he abused Overt-Kill, a prized plaything of an Italian godfather. Twistelli becomes a very dangerous man.
ComicInfo.Title: Twist of Fate
